title: baiters/advance_fee/sources/scamorama/stassen_kuba.html
notes:
--------------------------
Name: Harold Stassen
Address: 6214 East 47th Street, Chicago .Suite 69
Age: 96
Marital Status: Widower
Phone: I have none - I have been deaf since 1945 from a military injury. Helga used to use the phone for me, but I took it out when she passed away.
Occupation: Retired Military/Investments

THE APPLICATION OF CHANGE OF THE BENEFICIARY STATUS

Attn: DR.HENRY KOROMA,
Ets Danhoun Securities & Fils,
Foreign Operation Department.
Cotonou République Du Bénin.
TEL: 00229-93-983887
EMAIL: ets.danhounsecurities@techie.com 
 
SIR,
IT IS MY PLEASURE TO TENDER THIS APPLICATION TO YOUR NOBLE COMPANY IN REGARDS TO CHANGING OF THE BENEFICIARY STATUS OF THE CONSIGNMENT WITH DEPOSIT CODE N¡: 
(XXXXFGCC/6545) AND TRANSACTION CODE N¡:(EDF/471/2210KK) TO MY FAVOUR, AS AUTHORISED BY Mr.Sheik Kuba (late) IN THE CONTRACT AGREEMENT BETWEEN.
I Harold Stassen ,of address, 6214 East 47th Street,Chicago .Suite 69 ,APPLY FOR THE CHANGE OF BENEFICIARY STATUS FAVOURING MYSELF, I WISH AS THE RIGHTFUL
PERSON DEMANDS FOR YOUR PROCEDURES IN MAKING ME THE RIGHTFUL AND NEW BENEFICIARY AS I HAVE BEEN CONFIRMED THE RIGHTFUL PERSON BY THE ORIGINAL NEXT OF KIN TO
THE CONSIGNMENT (Mrs.Marria Kuba),
I WISH THE CHANGE BE MADE ON MY FAVOUR WITH IMMEDIATE EFECT, PLEASE COMMUNICATE Mrs.Marria Kuba FOR CONFIRMATION.
THANKS FOR YOUR ANTICIPATED CO-OPERATION AND I WILL APPRECIATE YOUR URGENT RESPONSE.
YOURS SINCERELY
Harold Stassen 
SINGN

messages.body:
mrsmarriakuba@vip.sohu.com




Sun, 4 May 2008

Dearest Friend, PLEASE READ CAREFULLY AND GET BACK TO ME.;
I crave your indulgence at this mail coming from somebody you have not know before. I decided to do this after praying over the situation. You should please
consider the transaction on its content and not the fact that you have not known me before. I need not dwell on how I came by your contact information
because there are many such possibilities these days. 
I would like to introduce myself as Mrs. Marria Kuba, of Repulic of Benin, widow to Late Mr.Sheik Kuba (for Consular of the benin embassy in Madrid,Spain.I
have been recently been daigonosed of Cancer of the Pelvics. I am writing from my sick bed in a CHINESE HOSPITAL here in Benin Republic. There is this
consignment (containg US$29.5Million cash, in US$100 bills) my husband deposited with a security company, here in Cotonou,Republic of Benin of which I am the
next of kin. With my health condition and because my husb and and I have no child I am looking for a credible person to whom I will pass the right of next of
kin. This person will apply to the company and request, from them, the procedure towards retrieving the consignment from them.This is on the condition that
you will take 25% of the fund for yourself, 5% used for expenses, while you will use the remaining 70% for the less previlege people in the society. This is
in fulfilment of the last request of my husband: that a substantial part of the fund be used to carter for the less previleged.
If this condition is acceptable to you, you should contact me immediately with your full names and contact information so that I will send you all the
documents that the company gave to my husband when the consignment was deposited. So that you will contact the company directly, and demand from them the 
procedure towards retrieving the consignment from their company.I cannot predict what will be my fate by the time you wll r ecieve the fund, but you should
please ensure that the fund is used as i have described above. I look forward to your response to this Email kubamrsmarria04@yahoo.com
Best Regards
Mrs. Marria Kuba

[Your basic CANCER letter.]

messages.body:
Mrs Kuba,
 
I am in sympathizing with you - pelvics is tough. Many of my former kameraden have living in hard times because our former employer, the Third Reich, has
gone out of busniess, taking with it our Wehrmacht pensions and the like. Only those like Goerring who were able to stash away some of those richness of
country we occupy have ease. It is this fund I wish to establishment - for officers as me who have servered the Vaterland goodly, yet are in dire povertiness
now.
 
If this is agreement to you, please write.
 
I am yours,
 
Harold Stassen
messages.raw:
Harold Stassen to Maria Kuba
Sent: Sat 5/03/08

Mrs Kuba,

I am in sympathizing with you - pelvics is tough. Many of my former kameraden have living in hard times because our former employer, the Third Reich, has gone out of busniess, taking with it our Wehrmacht pensions and the like. Only those like Goerring who were able to stash away some of those richness of country we occupy have ease. It is this fund I wish to establishment - for officers as me who have servered the Vaterland goodly, yet are in dire povertiness now.

If this is agreement to you, please write.

I am yours,

Harold Stassen

messages.subject: I wait urgently for your reply
messages.body:
kubamrsmarria02@yahoo.com





My Good Friend  Harold Stassen ,
 
I read your mail with happiness, Please be of good help to me, I really want the poor masses to survive because I came from a poor family before getting
married to my late rich husband, My late husband married me out of sympathy because he saw my family suffering, He made up his mind to marry me in order to
help my family out It will surprise you that for the love of the less privilege people in the society, My late husband ask me to make sure that the biggest
share of the fund goes to the poor and the needy.
 
Please will you stand for me to claim this fund and use it wise as planed by both me and my late husband? I would love you to be sincere and honest, You
shall partake greatly from this project, I have already map out 25% for your assistance, Also any expenses you incurred, I also set aside 5% for it, Which
means that you are entitle to 30%, then the rest, you share to the less privilege people in the society. please let me know you well, Can you send to me your
full profiles and contact details,
 
Your full name and house adderss
Your age and your marriage status
Your Occupation
Your phone number
 
Once I receive the above details, I will be so glad to forward you a text of application which you shall send to the security company as my beneficiary to
enable the security company approve you the new beneficiary of the fund consignment, Please Tell me, Are you a christian or what?.
 
God bless you as I wait urgently for your reply, I am more weaker day after day, Please do urgent so that you will be approved as my new beneficiary of the
fund before I die, I will die a happy death to hear that you have been approved my beneficiary so that you can handle this project.as i told you that i am
now in the hospital bed writing with Lab-Top. So go ahead and asist me, dont be afraid for is not a joke.
Till I hear from you, bless you
 
Mrs.Marria Kuba

messages.body:
Mrs Kuba,
 
I must say you now, I am not Christian, though I was borned as a Christian. If this is requirement or problem, ok, nice meeting you.
 
I, also, am having health issues for I am 96 years old of age and do not hear - I am deaf from military injury some years back ago. Perhaps I am not your
man, yes?
 
Write of me and tell me.
 
Yours,
 
H. S.
messages.raw:
Harold Stassen to Maria Kuba
Sent: Sun 5/04/08

Mrs Kuba,

I must say you now, I am not Christian, though I was borned as a Christian. If this is requirement or problem, ok, nice meeting you.

I, also, am having health issues for I am 96 years old of age and do not hear - I am deaf from military injury some years back ago. Perhaps I am not your

man, yes?

Write of me and tell me.

Yours,

H. S.

[You're not imagining it, this is almost exactly like 'her' earlier letter.]

messages.body:
Miss Kuba,
 
How pleasantry it is to have your mail. I am hoping all is well you, as well as can be anyway.
 
I have not writ because I have been pondering and pondering your offer - I would like to do if you would too. So much I can do for our retired Wehrmacht officers - many have no fundings and live by doing things. With many of them I spoke and would say "If you could have a retirement place for us, where would you like haveing it?" and it is funny - you may laugh - but the answerings is so diffenential! Those who had in Russia been will say me "Anyplace warm!" and those from the Afrika Corps will say me "Anyplace cold!" while those from France and Holland will say "Dijon!" So all will be happy, I have seen a spot, Joplin, Missouri, which fulfills much of they needs. With your kind help and blessings I will like to be building the "Mrs. Marria Kuba Haus fur die Wehrmachter" - a place where old kameraden can be with other old kameraden and do things. My dream, and maybe you too?
 
I have below given my informations - if more is needed by you, you write me.
 
Write me soon,
 
Yours,
 
H. S.
messages.raw:
Harold Stassen to Maria Kuba
Sent: Tue 5/06/08

Miss Kuba,

How pleasantry it is to have your mail. I am hoping all is well you, as well as can be anyway.

I have not writ because I have been pondering and pondering your offer - I would like to do if you would too. So much I can do for our retired Wehrmacht officers - many have no fundings and live by doing things. With many of them I spoke and would say "If you could have a retirement place for us, where would you like haveing it?" and it is funny - you may laugh - but the answerings is so diffenential! Those who had in Russia been will say me "Anyplace warm!" and those from the Afrika Corps will say me "Anyplace cold!" while those from France and Holland will say "Dijon!" So all will be happy, I have seen a spot, Joplin, Missouri, which fulfills much of they needs. With your kind help and blessings I will like to be building the "Mrs. Marria Kuba Haus fur die Wehrmachter" - a place where old kameraden can be with other old kameraden and do things. My dream, and maybe you too?

I have below given my informations - if more is needed by you, you write me.

Write me soon,

Yours,
H. S.

messages.subject: Ets Danhoun Securities & Fils
messages.body:
ACKNOWLEDGEMENT LETTER
ATTN: HAROLD STASSEN,
SIR,
THIS IS TO ACKNOWLEDGED THE RECEIPT OF YOUR APPLICATION TENDERED TO THIS NOBLE OFFICE TODAY BEING Wed, 7 May 2008 IN REGARD TO THE CHANGE OF BENEFICIARY 
STATUS OF THE CONSIGNMENT WITH DEPOSIT CODE NO:XXXXFGCC/6545 AND TRANSACTION CODE NO:EDF/471/2210KK DEPOSITED IN OUR CUSTODY BY MR.SHEIK KUBA (Late) ON YOUR 
FAVOUR.
REGARDS TO THIS, WE ADVICE YOU TO FORWARD TO US THE COPY OF YOUR INTERNATIONAL PASSPORT FOR IDENTIFICATION HENCE YOU ARE SEEKING FOR APPROVAL AS THE
NOMINATED BENEFICIARY OF MRS.MARRIA KUBA.
FURTHER MORE WE ADVICE YOU TO FORWARD TO THIS OFFICE A LEGALISED POWER OF ATTORNEY ISSUED TO YOU BY THE ORIGINAL NEXT OF KIN (MRS.MARRIA KUBA), THIS WILL 
CONFIRM TO US THAT YOU ARE THE RIGHTFUL PERSON CHOSEN TO BE PROCESSED THE APPROVAL OF BENEFICIARY STATUS IN HIS FAVOUR.
 
WE SHALL EXPECT THAT YOU VISIT OUR OFFICE ON OR BEFORE 14th MAY 2008  WITH ALL THE REQUIREMENTS TO ENABLE YOUR APPLICATION OBTAIN THE APPROVAL WHICH YOU
DEMANDED BUT SHOULD YOU FIND IT DIFFICULT TO VISIT US HERE AT THIS VERY TIME, THEN ASK MRS.MARRIA KUBA TO APPONIT AN ATTORNEY TO RENDER HIS LEGAL SERVICE ON
YOUR BEHALF HERE IN OUR OFFICE.
ANTICIPATING HEARING URGENTLY FROM YOU SOON.
YOURS SINCERELY.
MR.HENRY KOROMA
(Foreign Operation Department, Ets Danhoun Securities & Fils,Cotonou Republique Du Benin, Tel +229-93-93983887)

messages.body:
Mr Koroma,
 
It is good for you to contact me - many appreciations.
 
I have no passports for it is long since that I have traveled from this country - all I have is the included Soldier Identifying Kart, is this good?
 
Many thanks for this opportunity.
 
Yours,
 
H. S.
messages.raw:

Sent: Fri 5/09/08
To: ETS DANHOUN SECURITIES (ets.danhounsecurities@techie.com)

Mr Koroma,

It is good for you to contact me - many appreciations.

I have no passports for it is long since that I have traveled from this country - all I have is the included Soldier Identifying Kart, is this good?

Many thanks for this opportunity.

Yours,
H. S.


[WWII German Soldier's ID book, taken off the web with Harold's signature added]

messages.body:
Good morning to you and I hope you well.
 
The company sent mail to me and I send back to them my soldier identification - they say they are in need of my passport which I do not have. I have been in
this country since 50 years when my departed wife and I moved from Argentina with other former officers and their wives - I do not like the pampas but do
like here.
 
We will see what the company has to tell me of, then we will mail more.
 
Yours,
 
H. S.
messages.raw:
Harold Stassen to Maria Kuba
Sent: Sat 5/10/08

Good morning to you and I hope you well.

The company sent mail to me and I send back to them my soldier identification - they say they are in need of my passport which I do not have. I have been in this country since 50 years when my departed wife and I moved from Argentina with other former officers and their wives - I do not like the pampas but do like here.

We will see what the company has to tell me of, then we will mail more.

Yours,

H. S.

messages.body:
Please - I write him back, he does not reply yet. You will hear of me when he writes me back.
 
I have excitements for our business. I have told my kameraden we have anonymous person  who will support our cause - nice retirement
home for we in Wehrmacht. They happy with this, but not liking my choice of Joplin. I tell them it was once place as convent for holy sisters in church, will
have good vibes. They argue no good, so we meet tonight to make decisions. Will tell you of that.
 
Yours,
 
H. S.
messages.raw:
Harold Stassenn to Maria Kuba
Sent: Mon 5/12/08

Please - I write him back, he does not reply yet. You will hear of me when he writes me back.

I have excitements for our business. I have told my kameraden we have anonymous person [somebody with no name] who will support our cause - nice retirement home for we in Wehrmacht. They happy with this, but not liking my choice of Joplin. I tell them it was once place as convent for holy sisters in church, will have good vibes. They argue no good, so we meet tonight to make decisions. Will tell you of that.

Yours,

H. S.

messages.body:
Mrs,
 
Below is what the company has sent - I wrote back.
 
This may be all for nothing - for last night we met to talk of our new retirement home and would you know? All disagreement, especially between those who had
been soldiers in the East and those in Afrika. These from the East say we want to be where the weather is warm because in Russia it had got so cold we could
not even play our favorite soldier game "I Got Your Nose"  because when we would pull our hands away, we HAD their noses because the
extremity of cold made noses so brittle. And those from Afrika say they want coolness because the heat makes Nords sweat like swine and burns the skin and
gives nasal diptheria like Rommel had!
 
So much fighting I feel maybe you would be better giving your generosity to those who can do as you wish without making troubles with their friends.
 
Please advise to me.
 
Yours,
 
H. S.
messages.raw:
Harold Stassenn to Maria Kuba
Sent: Tue 5/13/08

Mrs,

Below is what the company has sent - I wrote back.

This may be all for nothing - for last night we met to talk of our new retirement home and would you know? All disagreement, especially between those who had been soldiers in the East and those in Afrika. These from the East say we want to be where the weather is warm because in Russia it had got so cold we could not even play our favorite soldier game "I Got Your Nose" ["Ich Habe Deinen Nase"] because when we would pull our hands away, we HAD their noses because the extremity of cold made noses so brittle. And those from Afrika say they want coolness because the heat makes Nords sweat like swine and burns the skin and gives nasal diptheria like Rommel had!

So much fighting I feel maybe you would be better giving your generosity to those who can do as you wish without making troubles with their friends.

Please advise to me.

Yours,
H. S.

Forwarded her THE ACKNOWLEDGEMENT LETTER - as above

messages.body:
Dear,
Ok today the lawyer will bring to me the power of attorney which I signed and he has left for the high court to legalise the document, once he provide me
with the document I will send to you.
But the lawyer said it shall cost you little money for approval in your favour, please just make sure you are approved as my beneificiary, I shall send you
the proof so that you see the picture of the consignment.
Open the attachment to see it. when my late husband was taking some money before his death.
Please you can do this with your family and all your friends who accept this with you, and those who do not accept forget them.
Bless you,
Marria

messages.body:
Mrs Marria,
 
I hope you are feeling today. You have send me the attorney thing and I am thinking maybe you should rethink of me. Members of the group for which I wants
the moneys are fighting over the simpler of thing! Some do not wish to go to Joplin because it was a house of womens, Sisters of the Order of Saint Beryl -
the Leaping Beryllians as they call theyselves - and the space is commodious yet the commodes are atrocious - they say there are no men's standing urinating
porcelains and want nothing of that. Some say if we go for Missouree we must look at Branson so there will be thing to do when we tire of remembering with
each other. Other persons say the south of Frankreich for it is nice, but the maquis still look for some of us. Others go on and on. I will not continue to
waste you time with the whole megillah, but Wehrmacht officers should not fight!
 
Before you die, please make a reconsider of the peoples you want for money. Better perhaps are those who will do Christly things like having orphanages and
bingo parlors, is this not true?
 
I wait to hear of you.
 
Yours,
 
H. S.
messages.raw:
Harold Stassen to Maria Kuba
Sent: Wed 5/14/08

Mrs Marria,

I hope you are feeling today. You have send me the attorney thing and I am thinking maybe you should rethink of me. Members of the group for which I wants the moneys are fighting over the simpler of thing! Some do not wish to go to Joplin because it was a house of womens, Sisters of the Order of Saint Beryl - the Leaping Beryllians as they call theyselves - and the space is commodious yet the commodes are atrocious - they say there are no men's standing urinating porcelains and want nothing of that. Some say if we go for Missouree we must look at Branson so there will be thing to do when we tire of remembering with each other. Other persons say the south of Frankreich for it is nice, but the maquis still look for some of us. Others go on and on. I will not continue to waste you time with the whole megillah, but Wehrmacht officers should not fight!

Before you die, please make a reconsider of the peoples you want for money. Better perhaps are those who will do Christly things like having orphanages and bingo parlors, is this not true?

I wait to hear of you.

Yours,
H. S.

[The "Sisters of Saint Beryl" or "The Leaping Beryllians" were featured in the original "Bedazzled" with Peter Cook and Dudley Moore.
The "maquis" is a name given to resistance fighters in France during WWII]

messages.body:
Mrs Marria,
 
I know I am keeping peoples waiting, but this is big business and must be planned with likeness to military attacks, see?
 
My fellow retired Wehrmacht officers meet me last night and we have talks again. I again say of importance for Joplin, Missouri, and some agree and some want
Branson, Missouri. To make closure, several of us will visit to both places this weekend. Emil Maurice will drive us for he has much experience. I am hoping
our bickerings can end for this journey.
 
When I say of your anonymous gift proposal, some are very happy, but Herr Diebardt is a barrister in the US and had been a very clever one in Germany.  He sees the picture of money and other document, but he
says "Who is she? She has millions of dollars and does not have one thousand? This is seeming bogus. People in Chinese hospitals do not have this kind of
money to give away - and the last time I was treated in a Chinese hospital I was sick all over again an hour later. Get photographs of her, and make sure it
is her." So I must ask for you to send some kinds of proofs for his satisfactoriness, is good?
 
I arrive back home on Monday and will look for the proofs then.
 
Yours,
 
H. S.
messages.raw:
Harold Stassen to Maria Kuba
Sent: Sat 5/17/08

Mrs Marria,

I know I am keeping peoples waiting, but this is big business and must be planned with likeness to military attacks, see?

My fellow retired Wehrmacht officers meet me last night and we have talks again. I again say of importance for Joplin, Missouri, and some agree and some want Branson, Missouri. To make closure, several of us will visit to both places this weekend. Emil Maurice will drive us for he has much experience. I am hoping our bickerings can end for this journey.

When I say of your anonymous gift proposal, some are very happy, but Herr Diebardt is a barrister in the US and had been a very clever one in Germany. [It was he who designed the "I Had Checks" defense at Nuremberg for many of us, so he is much respected.] He sees the picture of money and other document, but he says "Who is she? She has millions of dollars and does not have one thousand? This is seeming bogus. People in Chinese hospitals do not have this kind of money to give away - and the last time I was treated in a Chinese hospital I was sick all over again an hour later. Get photographs of her, and make sure it is her." So I must ask for you to send some kinds of proofs for his satisfactoriness, is good?

I arrive back home on Monday and will look for the proofs then.

Yours,
H. S.

[Emil Maurice was Hitler's chauffeur]

messages.body:
Dear,
It is well, but i do not like you try to expose this transaction is not good, I trusted you and ask you that you do this without problem, If you ask for
proof, the right proof is consignment picture, plus the power of attorney, which you have the copy,  Ok, i am sending you the two document which my late
husband used to deposit the consignment.
Please, I have send all my money because the doctor told me that i will die soon, now that why i want you to claim this consignment, Now the first thing is
to make sure that the company approved you my beneficiary, I have gotten the power of attorney which shows that I have authorising the security company to
approve you as my beneficiary there by release the consignment for possible shipment to you by diplomatic means.
Please contact the company and ask them, how to send the money to them so that they will approve you,  Please if i have money, i will ask you to pay but
because i do not have money again, I am just waiting for my death.  that why I ask you to take the money and share to the poor and needies.
Please open the attachment to see the two document which my late husband used to deposit the consignment containing the funds,, The certificate of deposit
and the contract aggreement.
N/B.  Please handle this documents with great care, Even another person who have this document can claim the consignment,  even the lawyer do not have this,
I am sending it to you because i have decided that you shall be my beneficiary and share the fund to the less previllaged, so do not expose this document for
the security of the fund consignment.
Bless you as I wait to hear that you have send the money to the company so that they will approve you.
Bless you,
Marria

Please, I have send all my money because the doctor told me that i will die soon, now that why i want you to claim this consignment, Now the first thing is to make sure that the company approved you my beneficiary, I have gotten the power of attorney which shows that I have authorising the security company to approve you as my beneficiary there by release the consignment for possible shipment to you by diplomatic means.
Please contact the company and ask them, how to send the money to them so that they will approve you, Please if i have money, i will ask you to pay but because i do not have money again, I am just waiting for my death. that why I ask you to take the money and share to the poor and needies.
Please open the attachment to see the two document which my late husband used to deposit the consignment containing the funds,, The certificate of deposit and the contract aggreement.
N/B. Please handle this documents with great care, Even another person who have this document can claim the consignment, even the lawyer do not have this, I am sending it to you because i have decided that you shall be my beneficiary and share the fund to the less previllaged, so do not expose this document for the security of the fund consignment.
Bless you as I wait to hear that you have send the money to the company so that they will approve you.
Bless you,
Marria

messages.body:
Mrs Marria,
 
I have sorrow for taking so long to return you excellent writing to me - we spend a long weekend in Missouri, and especially Branson where we decide to
locate the Wehrmacht Officers Retirement Mansion - nice place to live, high on a hill near river so our flank is covered from attacks on the east, and close
to where Yakov Schmirnoff and Andy Williams perform, not to mention the beautiful girls who make one excited without relying on weiner pills.
 
As for our business, it disappoints to me that you understand not the need to confide in my comerad Wilhelm. He is the only fine barrister I know in my life,
and I have known many. He is Treasurer of our Wehrmacht Officer Retirement Mansion Society and is needed for delivering moneys for our cause. I will send
this mail to him also and he has questions of you and will ask them. I am the person to decide where checks are to be writed to, but he does the writing.
This is part of the division of power and checks and balances we incorporate into our society in honor of those in the Dritte Reich which we so proud served.
 
You write me and write him, too. His name is Wilhelm Diebardt and mail is 
 
We wish to hear from you soon.
Yours,
 
H. S.
messages.raw:
Harold Stassen to Maria Kuba

[cc: Wilhelm Diebardt]

Sent: Tue 5/20/08

Mrs Marria,

I have sorrow for taking so long to return you excellent writing to me - we spend a long weekend in Missouri, and especially Branson where we decide to locate the Wehrmacht Officers Retirement Mansion - nice place to live, high on a hill near river so our flank is covered from attacks on the east, and close to where Yakov Schmirnoff and Andy Williams perform, not to mention the beautiful girls who make one excited without relying on weiner pills.

As for our business, it disappoints to me that you understand not the need to confide in my comerad Wilhelm. He is the only fine barrister I know in my life, and I have known many. He is Treasurer of our Wehrmacht Officer Retirement Mansion Society and is needed for delivering moneys for our cause. I will send this mail to him also and he has questions of you and will ask them. I am the person to decide where checks are to be writed to, but he does the writing. This is part of the division of power and checks and balances we incorporate into our society in honor of those in the Dritte Reich which we so proud served.

You write me and write him, too. His name is Wilhelm Diebardt and mail is {...}

We wish to hear from you soon.

Yours,
H. S.

messages.body:
Cc:  kubamrsmarria002@yahoo.com
Wilhelm,
 
As you can see from reading of this woman, she is good person. Your heart can be hard sometime. Please write to her and let us finish her off, OK?
 
Mrs Marria,
 
I send to you a picture of me and Wilhelm and those who compete in our recent Kriegslieder Karaoke Kompetition - I am the elderly gentleman in the middle of
the front, and Wilhelm is next to me. I am very happy with this event - I design the poster and raise much money for our cause. I hope you like.
 
We will hear of you soon, yes?
 
Yours,
 
H. S.

messages.subject: i am waiting urgently, if i am still awake when you write i will reply.?
messages.body:
Dears,
I am waiting near my email,  Please I want that you are approved immediately as my beneficiary and mark the consignment in your favour, then I have rest in
my mind,  because if anything happens to me now,  it will be hard for you to make the change of beneficiary, but as I am still alive, it is more easier to
make the change in your favour through me now.
Please it is possible for you and Williams visit me here?,  if it is possible, I perfer it,   but if not, then we arrage and shipment of the consignment as I
told you.
Please do not expose this transcation to another person please people are bad people can kill you because money, so keep it confidential to your both self
till you have this fund in your control.
Please did you contact the security company and send them the amount $1000 to make the change of beneficiary to your favour, after that, them you have full
right over the fund consignment. Ok contact the lawyer Barrister Smith Brown and ask him how and where to send him the money $1000 so that he take it to the 
company for the approval fees to confirm you my rightful beneficiary.
contact the barrister at smith.chamb@yahoo.fr  and tel. +229-97258454
call him and he will advise you on how to send the money so that he conclude this.
Please tell me if you both can visit here?
Bless you,
Marria

Please it is possible for you and Williams visit me here?, if it is possible, I perfer it, but if not, then we arrage and shipment of the consignment as I told you.
Please do not expose this transcation to another person please people are bad people can kill you because money, so keep it confidential to your both self till you have this fund in your control.
Please did you contact the security company and send them the amount $1000 to make the change of beneficiary to your favour, after that, them you have full right over the fund consignment. Ok contact the lawyer Barrister Smith Brown and ask him how and where to send him the money $1000 so that he take it to the company for the approval fees to confirm you my rightful beneficiary.
contact the barrister at smith.chamb@yahoo.fr and tel. +229-97258454
call him and he will advise you on how to send the money so that he conclude this.
Please tell me if you both can visit here?
Bless you,
Marria

messages.body:
Cc:  smith.chamb@yahoo.fr

Dear Lady,
Forgive an old man, but it is by caution that one succeeds. I realize your time is limited, is not everybody's? However, a visit is tragically out of the
question.
My friend Harold has foolishly (yes, "Foolishly" Harold) sent a photo which should not have been shared for reasons that he and I are well aware of. Please
destroy it when you can - it does neither of us any good.
But it DOES give me an idea - the poster in the background is known to only a few of us, and your use of it in a photograph of either yourself or your
barrister friend will convince me beyond the shadow of a doubt that you are indeed who you say you are. Strange as it seems, we will require you or your
designate to pose with the attached poster and send it to us, and please be sure to make it visible and prominent in the photo.
I have attached the poster, designed by our own Herr Stassen - please get back to me when you have our evidence, then we shall continue our correspondence
and discuss the transfer of funds.
Wilhelm Diebardt
messages.raw:
Wilhelm Diebardt to Maria Kuba and Harold Stassen
Sent: Wed 5/21/08

Cc: smith.chamb@yahoo.fr

Dear Lady,
Forgive an old man, but it is by caution that one succeeds. I realize your time is limited, is not everybody's? However, a visit is tragically out of the question.
My friend Harold has foolishly (yes, "Foolishly" Harold) sent a photo which should not have been shared for reasons that he and I are well aware of. Please destroy it when you can - it does neither of us any good.
But it DOES give me an idea - the poster in the background is known to only a few of us, and your use of it in a photograph of either yourself or your barrister friend will convince me beyond the shadow of a doubt that you are indeed who you say you are. Strange as it seems, we will require you or your designate to pose with the attached poster and send it to us, and please be sure to make it visible and prominent in the photo.
I have attached the poster, designed by our own Herr Stassen - please get back to me when you have our evidence, then we shall continue our correspondence and discuss the transfer of funds.
Wilhelm Diebardt


[Photoshopped Hitler Youth poster "Harold" designed for the Kompetition]

messages.body:
On Mon, 26 May 2008

Dear,
what do you want, you want to help me or what, all the pictures I sent to you weresnaped long time again, the only recent picture is the one the doctor
snaped me when they thought I want to die, i was in coma according to the doctor when they snaped me the recent picture, And I warned him, over my dead will
I snap another picture.
The lawyer told me he can not accept that rubish, He said you people are not serious, If you want to help me, kindly do, but if you are laughing at me
through the way you are acting to me, better stop please, so that I will know, I already told the lawyer that you are my late husband's business partner, and
now you have disaponited me.
Any way, I can not snap any picture and Lawyer already told me that we are kidding with him. So forget about that, if you want to help, then lets go on and
if not back out please, I am not fussing you to help me after all you will profit greatly in this. 
I send the picture which the doctor snaped me, if you cares?
Bless you and bye
messages.raw:
Marria Kuba to Harold Stassen
On Mon, 26 May 2008

Dear,
what do you want, you want to help me or what, all the pictures I sent to you weresnaped long time again, the only recent picture is the one the doctor snaped me when they thought I want to die, i was in coma according to the doctor when they snaped me the recent picture, And I warned him, over my dead will I snap another picture.
The lawyer told me he can not accept that rubish, He said you people are not serious, If you want to help me, kindly do, but if you are laughing at me through the way you are acting to me, better stop please, so that I will know, I already told the lawyer that you are my late husband's business partner, and now you have disaponited me.
Any way, I can not snap any picture and Lawyer already told me that we are kidding with him. So forget about that, if you want to help, then lets go on and if not back out please, I am not fussing you to help me after all you will profit greatly in this. I send the picture which the doctor snaped me, if you cares?
Bless you and bye
